name: Fibrocol - Strawberry  powder
description: Ispaghula husk seeds are used commercially for the production of mucilage. It is mainly used as a dietary fiber to relieve symptoms of both constipation and mild diarrhea, and occasionally as a food thickener. The plant is cultivated or gathered to obtain the seeds for medicinal use. Ispaghula husk is used without further processing or as preparations obtained by powdering the seed coats.
label: medicine
